summary: This is a list of postal code abbreviations used by the United States Postal Service.
full_text: The following is a sortable table of various codes and abbreviations used to represent the political divisions of the United States. These codes and abbreviations are used for postal addresses, data processing, general abbreviations, and other purposes. The table also includes abbreviations for three independent nations related to the United States through Compacts of Free Association, and other comparable postal abbreviations, including those now obsolete.
title: List of U.S. state abbreviations
